segments.text: I have to miss school next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't there some way you could work your schedule out to be here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , this is what I have to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How are you going to catch up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you miss this class , you will have used up your quota for the semester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , this will be the last class I miss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure to remind me right before you are absent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Enjoy your day off and don't forget to study !
segments.speaker: S2
